title: Berndes Skimmer Spoon
description: Cooking has never been so easy! From steak tongs to glass lids, we offer a comprehensive and high-quality range of accessories and aids to ensure success at any task in the kitchen. This makes using BERNDES cookware even better.Stainless steel with nylon tipCan be hung by hook at the end of handle for extra storage spaceGreat for indoor and outdoor cookingHand wash only
